segments.pli: Saṃyutta Nikāya 48
segments.en: Linked Discourses 48

segments.pli: 6. Sūkarakhatavagga
segments.en: 6. The Boar’s Cave

segments.pli: 58. Sūkarakhatasutta
segments.en: 58. The Boar’s Cave

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate sūkarakhatāyaṃ.
segments.en: At one time the Buddha was staying near Rājagaha, on the Vulture’s Peak Mountain in the Boar’s Cave.

segments.pli: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
segments.en: Then the Buddha said to Venerable Sāriputta:

segments.pli: “kiṃ nu kho, sāriputta, atthavasaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti?
segments.en: “Sāriputta, considering what benefit does a mendicant with defilements ended, while still alive, continue to show utmost devotion for the Realized One or his instructions?”

segments.pli: “Anuttarañhi, bhante, yogakkhemaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti.
segments.en: “Sir, it is considering the supreme sanctuary that a mendicant with defilements ended, while still alive, continues to show utmost devotion for the Realized One or his instructions.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
segments.en: “Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Anuttarañhi, sāriputta, yogakkhemaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattati.
segments.en: For it is considering the supreme sanctuary that a mendicant whose defilements are ended, while still alive, continues to show utmost devotion for the Realized One or his instructions.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, sāriputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo yaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti?
segments.en: And what is that supreme sanctuary?”

segments.pli: “Idha, bhante, khīṇāsavo bhikkhu saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ,
segments.en: “It’s when a mendicant with defilements ended develops the faculties of faith,

segments.pli: vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti … pe …
segments.en: energy,

segments.pli: satindriyaṃ bhāveti …
segments.en: mindfulness,

segments.pli: samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti …
segments.en: immersion,

segments.pli: paññindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ.
segments.en: and wisdom, which lead to peace and awakening.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, bhante, anuttaro yogakkhemo yaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti.
segments.en: It is considering this supreme sanctuary that a mendicant with defilements ended, while still alive, continues to show utmost devotion for the Realized One or his instructions.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
segments.en: “Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Eso hi, sāriputta, anuttaro yogakkhemo yaṃ sampassamāno khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatīti.
segments.en: For this is that supreme sanctuary.

segments.pli: Katamo ca, sāriputta, paramanipaccakāro yaṃ khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti?
segments.en: And what is that utmost devotion that a mendicant with defilements ended, while still alive, continues to show towards the Realized One or his instructions?”

segments.pli: “Idha, bhante, khīṇāsavo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo viharati sappatisso, dhamme sagāravo viharati sappatisso, saṃghe sagāravo viharati sappatisso, sikkhāya sagāravo viharati sappatisso, samādhismiṃ sagāravo viharati sappatisso.
segments.en: “It’s when a mendicant with defilements ended maintains respect and reverence for the Teacher, the teaching, the Saṅgha, the training, and immersion.

segments.pli: Ayaṃ kho, bhante, paramanipaccakāro yaṃ khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti.
segments.en: This is that utmost devotion.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
segments.en: “Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Eso hi, sāriputta, paramanipaccakāro yaṃ khīṇāsavo bhikkhu tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā paramanipaccakāraṃ pavattamāno pavattatī”ti.
segments.en: For this is that utmost devotion that a mendicant with defilements ended, while still alive, continues to show towards the Realized One or his instructions.”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: A mendicant honors the Realized One and his teaching for the sake of the supreme sanctuary.
